issue.title: Show ALL requests in requests view (also containing only 'automatic mining' products)
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

We'd like to show ALL requests in requests view. Also the ones containing only 'automatic mining' products.

Reasons are :
* Providers using automated extractions can't see they're diffusion history online
* Providers with mixed diffusion (automatic/manual) have a partial history
* Providers migrating from manual to automatic loose the visibility on diffusion history
* provider can't see if any request is pending in error (error with the REST transaction etc...)

The _requests_ view wont' change, only have more items if there's any 'full auto' orders. The _request_ view is ready (no big change needed).

**Fixed versions :** 4.5.0
